snippet.textDisplay:
This is the kind of stuff my parents should be watching. The news just go "THERE'S X MORE CONFIRMED CASES IN COUNTRY Y AND Z IT'S LOOKING REALLY BAD" and there's literally no other news except this. I get that you need to keep the people informed, but I'm sick of all the news spreading misleading panic info.
This is a much more informative and objective way of displaying the evolution of the virus. To me it feels like TV is actively TRYING to make people panic, though that's unlikely, even though if we all just respect the rules put in place we shouldn't have any problems.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
Severe case rate is between 15% and 20%.
Fatality rate:
If abundant medical resource(ventilator, oxygen generator etc.): can be under 1%: 0.6% (South Korea), 0.9% (China except Hubei Province).
If hospital is overwhelmed: 10%(early Wuhan), 9.8%(recent Italy, but Italy has more elder people)
If..
4.8%(later Wuhan. But doctors and other people from other Provinces of China helped a lot)
3.5% Hubei Province except Wuhan(Also helped by other Provinces of China).
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: I've heard several people try to downplay the seriousness by saying "We're only seeing all these new cases because they're doing more testing."  Yes, we are seeing these new cases because they already existed and now we can find them.  That doesn't mean they didn't exist until we tested for them.  This isn't Schrodinger's virus.
snippet.textOriginal: I've heard several people try to downplay the seriousness by saying "We're only seeing all these new cases because they're doing more testing."  Yes, we are seeing these new cases because they already existed and now we can find them.  That doesn't mean they didn't exist until we tested for them.  This isn't Schrodinger's virus.

Ok the original virus was a mistake, leaked from a lab in Wuhan, the virus effecting the West is another version of that original virus, except it is more resistant when on surfaces, the Chinese government created this new strain of virus and released it into the West to slow down their economies after it feared its own economy would stall and weaken its position not just in the ongoing US trade talks with an extremely aggressive and competitive Trump administration but also globally as companies around the world would look to move production to safer areas domestically or in south america. snippet.textDisplay:
First of all, before you lot come in and start your evident-less bashing because of the thubnail of this video, watch the freaking video. Then, to all of those just mindlessly claiming you know absolutely everything about China, which you don't, here are some points to consider:


- China locked down the city of Wuhan when less than 500 cases were confirmed, and later the province of Hubei. What was your city / country doing when you had 500 cases?
- Looking back at the data in China, it was estimated that when Wuhan had 500 cases, it actually had more than 3000 because of the delay of symptoms and therefore missed tests. What was your city / country doing when you had 3000 cases? What were YOU Doing when you had 3000 cases?
- China built two hospitals with more than 1000 beds each, each within one week. What were your city / country doing when your hospitals were full?
- China had 34 provincial units, with a majority of them having millions of population. All of them have made huge amount of contributions to the province of Hubei, each helping one major city in Hubei to fight the virus. If you are in Europe, what were your fellow EU buddies doing when you are in need? Were they helping out with all possible resources, or were they trying to take advantage of goods that you are entitled with? If you are in the States, are other states helping out when your state is in trouble?
- When you blame China for its slow action, are you the same people who earlier blamed China for locking down Wuhan and therefore violating human rights? What on earth do you want it to do then? Apply a Schrödinger's lockdown?
- You (some countries) were given 1.5 months to brace yourselves for the virus, but what were your government saying in the early stages? I bet it is something along the lines of "this is just a flu" or "everyone will be immune from it after they get it".


Of course, you might be able to tell from my broken English that I'm a Chinese living in Canada, so you might just think all the above texts are paid by the CCP. In which case, please keep what you believe is true and keep ignoring the world around you. That's sure a brilliant way of thinking.
snippet.textOriginal:
First of all, before you lot come in and start your evident-less bashing because of the thubnail of this video, watch the freaking video. Then, to all of those just mindlessly claiming you know absolutely everything about China, which you don't, here are some points to consider:


- China locked down the city of Wuhan when less than 500 cases were confirmed, and later the province of Hubei. What was your city / country doing when you had 500 cases? 
- Looking back at the data in China, it was estimated that when Wuhan had 500 cases, it actually had more than 3000 because of the delay of symptoms and therefore missed tests. What was your city / country doing when you had 3000 cases? What were YOU Doing when you had 3000 cases?
- China built two hospitals with more than 1000 beds each, each within one week. What were your city / country doing when your hospitals were full?
- China had 34 provincial units, with a majority of them having millions of population. All of them have made huge amount of contributions to the province of Hubei, each helping one major city in Hubei to fight the virus. If you are in Europe, what were your fellow EU buddies doing when you are in need? Were they helping out with all possible resources, or were they trying to take advantage of goods that you are entitled with? If you are in the States, are other states helping out when your state is in trouble?
- When you blame China for its slow action, are you the same people who earlier blamed China for locking down Wuhan and therefore violating human rights? What on earth do you want it to do then? Apply a Schrödinger's lockdown?
- You (some countries) were given 1.5 months to brace yourselves for the virus, but what were your government saying in the early stages? I bet it is something along the lines of "this is just a flu" or "everyone will be immune from it after they get it". 


Of course, you might be able to tell from my broken English that I'm a Chinese living in Canada, so you might just think all the above texts are paid by the CCP. In which case, please keep what you believe is true and keep ignoring the world around you. That's sure a brilliant way of thinking.

snippet.textDisplay: China is lying about the recovery rate. Or something fishy is going on. It seems weird that China all of a sudden is recovering just fine while everywhere else is rising and killing people. Either China is lying about not having new cases and that 70k people recovered. Unless China killed lots of people so they couldn't spread it. People are saying China did this on purpose to cause a economic crisis worldwide, to weaken it's enemies and to alow it's allies to grow stronger in all the confusion. Mark my words something is fishy going on, this doesn't seem like an accidentally pandemic.  In the coming months and years we're going to find out the truth. But I think we're at a point where someone, somewhere,  somehow is going to take advantage of covid 19.  Maybe a serial murderer, or rapist. Company's to price gouge, companies to illegally make deals and trades. Shady business's profiting off all of this. Everyday People are trying to profit off this.  That's actually sad because in Alot of places live has become a lot harder than it already was.  Covid 19 is taking out the vulnerable it's like a bully. And we need to stand up to the bully a take it head on. We need to work together. Not every man for himself. I cant say im shocked but a guy already tried to take advantage and brought in a fake note claiming he had covid 19 to get out of work. For two weeks. After that the had to shut down operations for 5 days, to test all the employees and completely sanitize the entire office cost god knows how much. He's in jail now.  What's worse is people aren't talking about the vulnerability for people with addictions, sex workers, disabled people and the homeless. And what about people in jail. Do you take them out to the yard for exercise one at a time? Smaller groups? What about recreational time? Or are they in their cells 24/7 what about solitary confinement? Are they going to be left in there while covid 19 starts to go away. With everything going on its possible and common. Alot of solitary inmates are left In too long or simply forgotten. The LGBT community is vulnerable too but,  Gays, Lesbians, Bisexuals, pansexual and the other sexualitys will be fine. Just stay home watch Netflix and masterbate. Buuut the last group in the community isn't so safe. Statically, many young Trans people are homeless or sleeping from house to house. Many of them are also Addicted to meth and pills, some smoke meth rereationally until it's not for fun anymore.  and some have at least tried it once or more. To make things work 40% have admitted to accepting cash for sexual favors while they were minors. Honestly It's sad that  there's a lot of people trying to be  politically correct as they can to virtue signal. It's always in news, all forms of media actually virtue signaling 24/7. They attack, vilify and try to destroy anyone who says anything remotely negative towards a Trans person. And if you do you get "canceled" and a whole whirlwind of hate mail and death threats. With all this exposure you would think that people would be donating millions of dollars in their communities, cities and towns. But sadly they don't. It's all for the clout. Look at me I'm politically correct. But they never help.  Stop using their pain for your own career or for Internet points. It's even worse when you do it in person and they start lecturing you. And start feeling high and mighty and will start to talk down to you. When in reality, they've never done a damn thing to help Trans men and women. They aren't your prop. They're nice people, their just like you or me. But they have something in their brains that causes them to not feel comfortable in their body. We don't talk about the issues because of all the sjws and fake Trans people. They make it impossible to even question things. We should be trying to find a cure or surgeries that will allow them to be comfortable in their own bodies. They wouldn't need, all the hormone treatments (which in 40 years we will see the true side effects of all this crap) they wouldn't need facial surgery, no need to cut off sex organs or breasts. They wouldn't live life thinking they aren't good enough, they wouldn't have to think about passing, worrying about telling their partners. The suicide rate is the same after the operation. Body dismorphia. A woman poured bleach in her eyes because he wanted to be blind and get rid of them. She'd even pretend to be blind as kid. Another guy wanted his arm off.. so while in a hospital bed waiting for the doctor. He tied a tourniquet around his arm until it turns purple and black by the time the doctor noticed is was too late and they had to amputate it. But immediately he wanted another part of his body amputated. Eventually he did try to at home and bled out.

snippet.textDisplay:
If we look at Japan & Taiwan, who let go of the restrictions too soon and they now have an increase in cases. Why has this not happened in China after the lockdown was lifted on Hubei? The Chinese have only tested ~20k people since 17th March. That is after testing ~680k in a month. So obviously they are purposefully under testing in order to be able to restart their economy.



P.S don't even bother responding with any whataboutism, sure, other governments are also undertesting, but this originated from China. Had they had better control and not silenced the doctors and tried to ignore it. Had they locked down prior to CNY it would be NO WHERE NEAR as bad on a global scale.
snippet.textOriginal:
If we look at Japan & Taiwan, who let go of the restrictions too soon and they now have an increase in cases.  Why has this not happened in China after the lockdown was lifted on Hubei?  The Chinese have only tested ~20k people since 17th March.  That is after testing ~680k in a month.  So obviously they are purposefully under testing in order to be able to restart their economy.  



P.S don't even bother responding with any whataboutism, sure, other governments are also undertesting, but this originated from China.  Had they had better control and not silenced the doctors and tried to ignore it.  Had they locked down prior to CNY it would be NO WHERE NEAR as bad on a global scale.

snippet.textDisplay:
As a Chinese student who study in Georgia, U.S. I have to tell you the truth.
I love my American friends, classmate and professors, they are the most wonderful people imaginable. However, in late January, when China had already warned the world for thousand times and cases in U.S started rising, most of them were doing the worst things imaginable. They genuinely believed that COVID-19 = seasonal flu, and they kept attending massive festivals or going to giant cities during long weekends, in fact some of them are probably of those Miami spring breakers who were exposed to YouTube.
China started to act in around Jan 25th, since then, it was showing the world of its methods: massive lock downs, face masks, quarantine, which later been followed by the wise countries like South Korea. In around Feb 7th, the new hospitals were finished and the first testing kit was coming out. Chinese were sacrificing everything to fight back the virus. Back in those days, I read the case number every hour and phoned my family every day, I was desperately wanting to go back home. In mid February, the curve started to flat out, despite one day there were suddenly more than 10k of new cases detected, and that was due to an introduction of more efficient testing standard.
Sadly, after these informations reached western countries, they were transferred into tools of slandering China after been reported by medias like CNN and politicians like Mr. Trump and Pompeo. I kept telling my friends to avoid massive social activities and even shared my face masks with them, but they would always reject politely, I think it is because deep down in mind, they think China is not trustworthy. I felt so sad that I eventually couldn't stop them from risking themselves or their family members.
Judging from China's case vs time table, I successfully predicted that the burst of cases in U.S would start in early March. Judging from what Americans were doing to stop Covid-19, I predicted that the outbreak will be much, much worse than China during its worst time, so I abandoned the upcoming quarter and was able to catch up the last few flights back to China. I am now doing 14 day quarantine, watching this reasonable and amazing video and the people in comment section still can't believe truth.
snippet.textOriginal:
As a Chinese student who study in Georgia, U.S. I have to tell you the truth.
I love my American friends, classmate and professors, they are the most wonderful people imaginable. However, in late January, when China had already warned the world for thousand times and cases in U.S started rising, most of them were doing the worst things imaginable. They genuinely believed that COVID-19 = seasonal flu, and they kept attending massive festivals or going to giant cities during long weekends, in fact some of them are probably of those Miami spring breakers who were exposed to YouTube.
China started to act in around Jan 25th, since then, it was showing the world of its methods: massive lock downs, face masks, quarantine, which later been followed by the wise countries like South Korea. In around Feb 7th, the new hospitals were finished and the first testing kit was coming out. Chinese were sacrificing everything to fight back the virus. Back in those days, I read the case number every hour and phoned my family every day, I was desperately wanting to go back home. In mid February, the curve started to flat out, despite one day there were suddenly more than 10k of new cases detected, and that was due to an introduction of more efficient testing standard. 
Sadly, after these informations reached western countries, they were transferred into tools of slandering China after been reported by medias like CNN and politicians like Mr. Trump and Pompeo. I kept telling my friends to avoid massive social activities and even shared my face masks with them, but they would always reject politely, I think it is because deep down in mind, they think China is not trustworthy. I felt so sad that I eventually couldn't stop them from risking themselves or their family members.
Judging from China's case vs time table, I successfully predicted that the burst of cases in U.S would start in early March. Judging from what Americans were doing to stop Covid-19, I predicted that the outbreak will be much, much worse than China during its worst time, so I abandoned the upcoming quarter and was able to catch up the last few flights back to China. I am now doing 14 day quarantine, watching this reasonable and amazing video and the people in comment section still can't believe truth.

China's outbreak is a few months ahead of everyone else. if you have a brain you should be able to connect the dots. what is happening in China will be a proxy of what's going to happen in your country later.

you should be happy that you have the data to project what is coming your way, rather than storming through uncharted waters. now all you needa do is to copy what China and South Korea have been doing!

snippet.textDisplay: The problem is the data. Is it any good. Answer a big 'No' for China who are lying outright, and 'No' for Italy who are lying in the opposite direction i.e. exaggerating the death rate. Why? being a complete mystery. I think that the answer is that this super soft generation are panicking over something that is not such a big deal in the grand scheme of things. It's not the Black Death, Spanish Flu, Ebola, the first day of the Somme, the Blitz or Hiroshima. The cure appears worse than the disease.
